name: yieldfarming
description: Boilerplate for a Static website using EJS and SASS

scripts.dev: npm run setup-for-dev && npm-run-all --parallel start watch:*
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all --sequential rmprod copy-to-dist minify:js minify:css prepend-banner hash-filenames minify:html
scripts.build:css: NODE_ENV=development npm run sass && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.watch:css: NODE_ENV=development npm run sass && node-sass -w -r src/css -o dist/css --source-map true
scripts.minify:html: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:html && babel-node build-tools/minify-html.js
scripts.minify:css: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:css && babel-node build-tools/minify-css.js
